dcterms:creator: Yongqin Xian
Christoph H Lampert
Bernt Schiele
Zeynep Akata
dcterms:description: The Animals with Attributes2 (AwA2) dataset consists of images of animals from 50 disjoint classes, split into 40 seen classes for training and 10 unseen classes for testing. It provides relations among 85 attributes and classes through a binary class-attribute matrix.
dcterms:title: Animals with Attributes2 (AwA2)
